title: Print, "Waves on Shiga Beach (Shiga no Uranami), No. 29", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Waves on Shiga Beach
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 29 / Shiga no Uranami.
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves purple with rays of white; inner leaves white with purple tips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Waves on Shiga Beach (Shiga no Uranami), No. 29", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-82.
